title: Workshop on Utilizing the SOP2 Model for Flipped Learning-Based Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific principles and understanding of flipped learning concepts
context.additional_context: Providing experience in designing online flipped learning to enhance science-related job competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can implement cognitive processes across exploration-integration-solution phases for science topics using the SOP2 model (self-study-online discussion-two-stage presentation)
Learners can improve science problem-solving abilities by 20% through peer feedback and collaboration in flipped classroom environments

Learners demonstrate their ability to apply scientific concepts through a comparison of pre- and post-workshop worksheets during the two-stage presentation process (outline presentation - final presentation).

resources: Digital Learning Resources on Science Topics (PDF/Video)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
